channel.title: 99 problems mix used in the BF3 trailer
channel.description:
Hey I love the mix of 99 problems by Jay-Z in the BF3 trailer, but I can't find out who mixed it or where I can download it (Or even if I can). I know its dubstep, but searching for it on the internet has yielded no results, if you have any information pertaining to this amazing mix, please let me know.
Thanks and happy holidays

item.title: 99 problems mix used in the BF3 trailer
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
https://www.youtube-mp3.org/

Aww I got beat. BTW the reason you aren’t finding it is clearly because it was mixed specifically for the trailer. As the extra sounds and stuff added seem to be from BF3’s sound assets.

Anyone else think its funny that they used a track called “99 Problems” who would want to buy a game with 99 problems?

Read full topic

item.source: 99 problems mix used in the BF3 trailer

item.title: 99 problems mix used in the BF3 trailer
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Alright so I’ve just listened to both the trailer and the song, and it’s not even the a mix. It’s just bits and parts of the tracks put one after the other. (oh and with a bit of adjustments on the treble and bass)

If you want to listen to the song as it appears in the trailer, just open Winamp/WMP/iTunes/Whatever, select 99 Problems by Jay-Z, press play and skip it now and then.

Read full topic
